mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notices (num, title, contents, regdate, hit, orgfileName, saveFileName, fileSize, ADMINNUM) VALUES(faq_seq.NEXTVAL,#{title},#{contents},SYSDATE,#{hit},#{orgfileName},#{saveFileName},#{fileSize},#{ADMINNUM})
mapper.select: SELECT num, title, contents, regdate, hit, ADMINNUM FROM notices ORDER BY num DESC
